review.title: “Generall supportive”
review.pros: Pros – As long as the client is happy my boss is happy - pretty simple. I have always been treated fairly and rewarded for good work. Most of the folks there are pretty friendly and have always been helpful.
review.cons: Cons – I am remote from HQ and don't always a good read on what is going on within the company - This is mainly due to my assignment.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “No communication”
review.pros: Pros – Good opportunity for new skills and knowledge. Very little over-the-shoulder management.
review.cons: Cons – Lied about starting salery. Vastly underpaid for the work I do. I work remotely and have absolutly no communication with the office and have no idea what is going on there. No effort is made to communicate with off-site. Very tight on the purse strings. No chance for any advancement.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “EView has a nice atmosphere, but as a business is not concerned with employees”
review.pros: Pros – Great physical environment, relaxed, good peers
review.cons: Cons – Lied about starting salery, very tight on the purse strings
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
